description:
Fedora Media Writer is a tool that helps users put Fedora images on their portable drives such as flash disks.


- Updated macOS and Windows builds to use Qt 6.9.3
- Updated Windows builds to use Windows 2025
- Fixed macOS ARM64 builds
- Updated translations
NOTE: There is a known issue (#897) in Qt on macOS 26, where the progress bar doesn't properly respect the layout. The issue is now fixed in upstream, but will be probably fixed in our builds with update to Qt 6.10.1.
